name: CanYouSurvive?
description: CanYouSurvive? is a challenging endless platform game, Make your way through obstacles that get more difficult the further you get. But don't forget about the main character unique ability.
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft® Windows® 7 Or Later Processor: I3-4005U Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512MB or higher DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 623 MB available space
